name: Task Master
description:
Help all the peasants make it to the exit without any of them dying but you can only control one at a time while the others never stop moving! Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. This was my first time participating in a game jam and it was a lot of fun! I hope you enjoy it!

***This game should be played in fullscreen on a 1920x1080 display***

Controls:

  • Move left - A
  • Move right - D
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Select peasant - Left Click
  • Deselect peasant - Z
